Revert to revision 65099880 dated 2006-07-21 21:11:11 by ChrisO using [[:en:Wikipedia:Tools/Navigation_popups|popups]]
/* The Church of Scientology */ - copyedits for accuracy
Unprotected Scientology: Un-semi-protecting - it's been long enough
explain: HCOB; Hubbard Communications Office Bulletin
/* Silent birth and infant care */ this verges on OR too. I'd suspect 'the majority of doctors' aren't even aware of his claims
/* Silent birth and infant care */ this counts as OR. ie refutation of an argument not attributed to 3rd party.
/* Controversy and criticism */
inclusion in cults category moved to reference to cults category. Relevant place for this info is [[List of groups referred to as cults]] See talk:Category:Cults for rationale.
/* Operating Thetan levels and the Xenu incident */
Unprotected page -- removing tag
while on taking out redundancies...
/* Silent birth and infant care */ only need one 'asserts' per sentence
The cited reference IS the verifiable source. JWSchmidt seems to think we should be substituting our own judgement about whether that source's summation is *true* for whether it is *verifiable*.
The cited reference apparently presents the view of Dan Goodin , and does not name its sources or cite verifiable sources to support Goodin's position
The cited source (Leiby) does not document and support this sentence
restored "and"; they are both objects of the verb "alleviated"

/* Critical sites */
